entry.title: Y Eau de Parfum Spray for Men by Yves Saint Laurent
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yves Saint Laurent
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 102.95 - 123.95 (2 variants)

Authentic and earthy, Y Eau De Toilette by Yves Saint Laurent is an ode to youth of Generation Y. Energetic and charming, the unique fragrances of this perfume offers a wonderful balance between the wild and the staid. Perfect for both the office and the trail. About the Brand: Yves Saint Laurent is a well-know France-headquartered luxury and high-fashion company, that specializes in haut couture, fragrances and jewelry.

entry.title: Opium Eau de Toilette Spray for Women by Yves Saint Laurent
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yves Saint Laurent
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 80.95 - 115.95 (2 variants)

YSL Opium perfume is an Eau de Toilette for women by Yves Saint Laurent. It is a very unique feminine fragrance with oriental accords. It has floral and citrusy notes with undertones of wood and spice. A subtle vanilla accord gives it a sensual and delicious aroma.

entry.title: L'Homme Eau de Toilette Spray for Men by Yves Saint Laurent
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yves Saint Laurent
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 74.95 - 137.95 (3 variants)

L'Homme cologne is an Eau de Toilette for men by Yves Saint Laurent. It is an intensely masculine fragrance that is a blend of spicy and woody notes. There is a hint of floral and leafy notes along with subtle and fresh citrus that make it an interesting blend of subtle and intense aromas.

entry.title: Black Opium For Women By Yves Saint Laurent Eau De Parfum Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yves Saint Laurent
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 79.95 - 162.95 (5 variants)

Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium perfume takes a wander on to the dark side of the legendary fashion brand's cult classic Opium. An addictive fragrance for the modern woman, it has copious quantities of coffee in its scent. Orange blossom, pink pepper and jasmine introduce an undercurrent of edgy femininity. This intoxicating women's fragrance was developed by master perfumers Marie Salamagne and Nathalie Lorson, along with Honorine Blanc and Olivier Cresp.

The composition of YSL's La Nuit de L'Homme L'Intense is made up of seductive, deep oriental chords. The scent reflects courage, charisma, seduction and strength of the modern man. This is the ideal evening wear fragrance for men and has a long-lasting character.

L'Homme 2016 is described as unique composition exuding power and wilderness on the one hand and delicacy on the other. It reflects the contrast between control and freedom and is created for the man who can charm women and serve as an inspiration for other men. L'Homme EDP is woody, intense and aromatic.

Mon Paris Eau de Toilette Spray for Women by Yves Saint Laurent is a mesmerizing fragrance that captures the essence of passionate love and romance. With its delicate blend of fruity and floral notes, it exudes elegance and sensuality, leaving a trail of enchantment wherever you go.

LHomme La Nuit is an Eau de Toilette for men by Yves Saint Laurent. It is a masculine fragrance full of interesting contradictions and contrasts. It has strong woody and spicy notes offset by subtle aroma of lavender and freshness of bergamot. It is a dark, mysterious and explosive fragrance that is bound to draw attention.

entry.title: Mon Paris For Women By Yves Saint Laurent Eau De Parfum Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yves Saint Laurent
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 97.95 - 113.95 (2 variants)

Yves Saint Laurent’s stunning line of Paris-inspired fragrances has been setting the world on fire and the latest weapon of choice is Mon Paris. Mon Paris was launched in the middle of 2016 and over the years, has gained a lot of attention. This fragrance is the modern interpretation of a woman’s life – a life that seasoned with love, free will, intensity, and challenges.
